data.text: Mede aseda bɛma Awurade berɛ nyinaa;
Me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho wɔ Awurade mu;
Mo ne me nkamfo Awurade;
Mefrɛɛ Awurade na ɔgyee me so;
Wɔn a wɔhwɛ nʼanim no hyerɛn
Ohiani yi frɛeɛ, na Awurade tiee no;
Awurade ɔbɔfoɔ wɛn wɔn a wɔsuro no,
Monka nhwɛ na monhunu sɛ Awurade yɛ.
Monsuro Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼahotefoɔ,
Agyata yɛ mmrɛ na ɛkɔm de wɔn,
Mommra, me mma, monyɛ aso mma me;
Mo mu hwan na ɔpɛ nkwa
Ɛnneɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔka kasa bɔne, na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔgyae atorɔtwa.
Twe wo ho firi bɔne ho, na yɛ papa;
Awurade ani wɔ ateneneefoɔ so
Awurade ani sa wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne,
Ateneneefoɔ team su, na Awurade tie wɔn;
Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔapa aba
Onipa tenenee bɛhunu amaneɛ bebree
ɔbɔ ne nnompe nyinaa ho ban,
Bɔne bɛkum ɔdebɔneyɛfoɔ;
Awurade gye nʼasomfoɔ nkwa;
